titleStmt.title: A second admonition to the dissenting inhabitants of the diocess of Derry concerning Mr. J. Boyse's Vindication of his Remarks on A discourse concerning the inventions of men in the worship of God : with an appendix containing an answer to Mr. B's objections against the sign of the cross / by William, Lord Bishop of Derry.
titleStmt.author: King, William, 1650-1729.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
